title: Why cant I buy champions?
body: I have 4800 IP.. can't buy brand?

replies.body:
This is a bug that sometimes happens on the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this by launching into the *Legacy Client*, which you can access from the login screen to complete your purchase.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this helped!
